mapper.select: SELECT categoryID, category_detail_NM FROM category WHERE category_NM = '대분류'

SELECT CONCAT(A.group_ID, A.category_LEV, A.category_detail_LEV) AS n_key, A.category_NM, CONCAT(repeat(' ',A.category_parent_LEV * 3), A.category_detail_NM) as category_name, CASE A.category_parent_LEV WHEN 0 THEN C.category_detail_NM WHEN 1 THEN CONCAT(B.category_detail_NM,' > ', A.category_detail_NM) WHEN 2 THEN CONCAT(C.category_detail_NM, ' > ', B.category_detail_NM,' > ', A.category_detail_NM) END as navigator FROM Template_TB A LEFT JOIN Template_TB B ON A.category_parent_LEV = B.category_LEV AND A.category_detail_parent_LEV = B.category_detail_LEV LEFT JOIN Template_TB C ON A.group_ID = C.group_ID WHERE A.category_ID > 0 AND C.category_id = ( SELECT category_id FROM Template_TB sub2 where category_ID > 0 and category_LEV = 1) ORDER BY navigator
